data.title: Kutjevo Rosé Premium 2023
data.meta_description:
Rosé premium

Wine type

Vino rosé

Location

Hrnjevac, Vetovo

Volume

0,75 l

Year

2023.

Alcohol

12 %

Variety

Pinot noir, Zweigelt

(Fixed conversion rate: 1 € = 7,53450 kn)

Tasting notes:

Premium blend of world-famous varieties Zweigelt and Pinot Noir obtained by short-term maceration. The aromatic profile is opened by the delicate scents of roses and pomegranates rounded off by the delicate fruity aromas of strawberry and raspberry perfectly blended into the seductive salmon color of the Provençal style.

Enjoy with:

We recommend serving at 8-10 ° C as an aperitif or with lighter dishes such as pasta, risotto with seafood, salted fish and salmon.

Description


This Rosé captivates with its refined aromas of red berries, among which cranberries enriched with freshness of plant character stand out.
It is the terroir that gives this Premium Rosé a specialty, freshness and exceptional drinkability that will win you over on the first try. An earlier harvest of the Zweigelt variety yields good acids and freshness, as well as lower alcohol, and a later harvest of the Pinot variety produces structure and richer aromas of this exceptional wine.
The burgundy bottle with an attractive label perfectly complements the refined, pale pink color of this unique wine, and is a decoration for every table.


Awards

Vinalies Internationales 2024. – silver
